subject: Always parse markdown in freeform mode, remove MD toggle
body:
Freeform mode now always renders markdown - no toggle needed.
Users type markdown syntax (# heading, **bold**, - lists) and it
renders immediately. Removes the per-cell MD button that was causing
confusion since users expected markdown to just work.
